meanings.definition: The muscular tissue of the heart.
meanings.sent1: The myocardium helps the heart pump blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the myocardium to understand heart health.
meanings.sent3: The myocardium decided to throw a party for the other heart tissues.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as strong as the myocardium of the heart.
meanings.sent5: The myocardium, like a powerful engine, keeps the heart beating.

meanings.definition: The middle muscular layer of the heart wall.
meanings.sent1: The myocardium provides strength to the heart wall.
meanings.sent2: During surgery, doctors pay close attention to the myocardium.
meanings.sent3: The myocardium in the heart wall flexed during exercise.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as solid as the myocardium in the heart wall.
meanings.sent5: The myocardium, like a sturdy shield, protects the heart.
